metadata.title: CVE-2020-12406 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Mozilla Developer Iain Ireland discovered a missing type check during unboxed objects removal, resulting in a crash. We presume that with enough effort that it could be exploited to run arbitrary code. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 68.9.0, Firefox < 77, and Firefox ESR < 68.9.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
thunderbird package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:68.9.0+build1-0ubuntu1').
